meanings.sent1: The coprosperities of the two companies led to a successful partnership.
meanings.sent2: The community worked together to achieve coprosperities for all its members.
meanings.sent3: The coprosperities between the two friends made them unstoppable in their endeavors.
meanings.sent4: Their coprosperities shone brightly, illuminating the path to shared success.
meanings.sent5: The coprosperities between the siblings made their bond unbreakable.

meanings.definition: coprosperities: the state of being prosperous together
meanings.sent1: The coprosperities of the team were evident in their joint accomplishments.
meanings.sent2: The coprosperities of the neighborhood brought about a sense of unity.
meanings.sent3: Their coprosperities were so strong that they always shared their good fortune.
meanings.sent4: In their coprosperities, they built a foundation of success that lasted for years.
meanings.sent5: The coprosperities of the group created a harmonious atmosphere of growth.
